data.title: Ben Chapman - Chief Executive Officer at Vital Interaction
data.meta_description: Ben Chapman has a diverse work experience spanning several industries.
data.text:
Ben Chapman has a diverse work experience spanning several industries. Ben currently serves as the Chief Executive Officer at Vital Interaction, a position they started in March 2022. Prior to this, they held the role of Sr. Vice President, Strategic Partnerships at WellSky from July 2021 to March 2022. Ben also served as the General Manager - Home Health and Hospice at WellSky from July 2018 to July 2021.

Before their time at WellSky, Ben worked at Kinnser Software, where they held various roles. Ben was the Vice President of Sales from July 2015 to June 2018, Director of Sales from January 2013 to July 2015, and Account Executive from November 2008 to January 2013.

Ben's earlier experiences include serving as a Finance Manager at AEG Live from July 2007 to October 2008, a Finance Coordinator at Viejas Enterprises from 2005 to 2007, and working in Corporate Sales at House of Blues from 2002 to 2005.

Ben Chapman attended San Diego State University, where they pursued a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting.
